23   
24  # For simplicity's sake, LMTYPE_INIT will be handled specially without the need for an explicit handler 
25  # in the transport. 
26  LMTYPE_INIT = 0 
27  # LMTYPE_NETWORK is a message for the networking system associated with a transport. 
28  LMTYPE_NETWORK = 1 
29  # LMTYPE_NETWORK_PROTO is a protocol message for the networking system associated with the transport. 
30  # For example a MeshRouter hop count update message would be sent with this type. 
31  LMTYPE_NETWORK_PROTO = 2 
32   
33   
34  # NetMessage type for the Messaging system 
35  NMTYPE_MESSAGING = 0 
36
